Title: Relates to requiring that certain forms be made available in Nepali
Summary: Requires that all written tests, forms, registration forms and applications for an initial learner's permit or driver's license be made available in Nepali.
LawCode: Add ยง224-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring certain motor vehicle forms, applications, and examinations to be available in Nepali
